author: Special Correspondent
text: District Collector N. Subbaiyan launched a special vaccination camp for protecting the cattle against the dreaded foot-and-mouth-disease at Palliyeri panchayat on Tuesday. This is the 10th round of FMD vaccination in the district under the State-wide programme. Dr. Subbaiyan, himself a veterinarian, said 77 vaccination teams had been formed and said that so far 3.87 lakh heads of cattle had been covered under the programme in the district. Regional Joint Director of Animal Husbandry Dr. Palanisamy, Deputy Director Rajasekar, Assistant Directors Ravichandran and Nedunchezhian were present.
title: Vaccination drive against FMD begins in Thanjavur
